description: You gain two extra skill points at each Defensive Divination (Awareness) level. This takes effect the level you select the feat Through the subtle, constant use of divination and continues for every level thereafter. It is not abilities, you are made aware of danger a few retroactive, nor is it multiplied at first level, being moments before it actually occurs. While this added on as a bonus in a similar vein to bonus skill does not always give you the ability to evade such points for being human. dangers, you are able to react when others could not.
